summary: Bitcoin is a digital money called cryptocurrency. It was created in 2008 by someone using the name Satoshi Nakamoto. People use computers to solve complex math puzzles to create new Bitcoins and verify transactions. These transactions are recorded in a public online ledger called a blockchain. Bitcoin is not controlled by any government or bank. It can be used to buy things, but many people see it as an investment. Some countries have banned it due to its use in illegal activities.
title: Bitcoin
